page.title: 19WEST FELTON EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MOST MEN IN THE VILLAGE HAVE EMPLOYMENT AND MOST YOUNGSTERS LEAVING SCHOOL SEEM TO BE ABLE TO FIND A JOB.THE WORK VARIES,SOME WORK AWAY ON BUILDING SITES ,A GOOD NUMBER WORK IN AGRICULTURE,SEVERAL ARE BUS OR LORRY DRIVERS AND A FEW HAVE WHITE COLLAR JOBS IN SHREWSBURY. TWO SMALL FIRMS,F.JONES AND E.P.JONES EMPLOY MEN IN BUILDING AND PLUMBING,AND THERE ARE QUITE A NUMBER OF SELF-EMPLOYED JOBBING BUILDERS IN THE AREA. A FAIR NUMBER OF WOMEN HAVE JOBS LOCALLY,VARYING FROM DOMESTIC WORK TO SECRETERIAL WORK,AND INCLUDING ANCILLARY HELP IN THE SCHOOL,TEACHING,HAIRDRESSING AND DELIVERING MILK. THERE IS ALSO EMPLOYMENT AS POTATO PICKERS IN THE AUTUMN.
